0.3 (2010-03-23)
================

- Do not consider directory and files as "created" by buildout, otherwise they
  will be automatically removed by buildout when the recipe is uninstalled.

- Added logging

0.2 (2010-03-07)
================

- Added a new recipe entry point ``mkfile``.

0.1 (2010-02-29)
================

- Initial release.
